Html:
Hello guys,

I've just installed all .dll and app to run Goblin XNA, but when I try to run tuto 8, I'm getting this msg:
"It's not possible to load the DLL ARTagWrapper.dll. Fail ..."

And I have this .dll in bin directory.

What should i do to make it work, please !?

Thanks very much,

Felipe

Hi Felipe,

Can you post the exact error message? Also, do you have only VS 2008 installed, but don't have VS 2005 installed? As I mentionedÂ on another discussion post, there is a known issue for ARTagWrapper.dll if you only have VS 2008 installed. We have asked Mark Fiala (ARTag developer) to have this issue fixed, and hopefully he will fix it soon.

ohan
